StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_ArchiveMudData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ZipCode varchar(9), @UserOrgId int, @UserLogin varchar(15)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE MUD_FILE SET STATUS_ID = 'R', USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = getdate() WHERE ZIP = @ZipCode
--- UPDATE THE HISTORY TABLE WITH LATEST DATE EXEC sp_UpdateMudHistoryLog @UserOrgId, @UserLogin
